campaigns.name: The Fellowship's Journey
campaigns.description: A perilous quest to destroy an ancient artifact of immense power.

campaigns.name: Defending Minas Tirith
campaigns.description: An epic battle to protect the white city from the forces of darkness.

campaigns.name: Mines of Moria
campaigns.description: A treacherous expedition through ancient dwarven halls.

campaigns.name: Rohan's Last Stand
campaigns.description: Rally the Rohirrim to defend their homeland against insurmountable odds.

campaigns.name: Shadows over Gondor
campaigns.description: Uncover a sinister plot threatening the stability of Gondor.
